alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 7:16PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Highlands, eastern Charlotte, eastern DeSoto and northeastern Lee Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 716 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Sebring Regional Airport to 10 miles west of Lake Placid to near Babcock Ranch. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sebring, Lake Placid, Sebring Regional Airport, Sylvan Shores, Lake Istokpoga, Babcock Ranch, Charleston Park, Venus, Brighton, Cornwell, Alva, Lake Josephine, Archbold, Placid Lakes, Lorida and Avon Park Air Force Range. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: DeSoto; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee
